sub_topic: Determining the type of bond between two atoms
message_1: What is the type of bond formed between a lithium ion (Li+) and a fluorine ion (F-)?
message_2: The type of bond formed between a lithium ion (Li+) and a fluorine ion (F-) is an ionic bond. This bond is formed due to the electrostatic attraction between the positively charged lithium ion and the negatively charged fluorine ion.
